title: FULL VIDEO ON BOOK AND KEYWORD RESEARCH FOR AMAZON KDP - PART 1
channel: Joshua Barth | KDP Publisher and Creator.
description:
FULL VIDEO ON BOOK AND KEYWORD RESEARCH FOR AMAZON KDP – PART 1

In this in-depth Part 1 tutorial, I walk you through the complete process of book and keyword research for Amazon KDP, step by step. This video is designed for beginners and intermediate publishers who want to make data-driven decisions before publishing on Amazon.

You’ll learn how to:

Research other Amazon marketplaces (US, UK, CA, AU, and more) to spot hidden opportunities

Select strong, buyer-intent keywords that actually convert

Analyze Best Seller Rank (BSR) to confirm real sales activity

Identify niches with consistent demand and low competition

Check profitability before writing or outsourcing any book

Avoid common KDP research mistakes that waste time and money

This video focuses on validation before publishing, helping you understand whether a book idea is worth pursuing—or should be skipped entirely.
